comments.body:
Add a build section here like:

``` yaml
build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt
```

The `build/script` will do the job of the `build.sh` and `bld.bat`. The extra options are recommend when using setuptools to produce a package that plays nice with conda.
